formatted_address: 323C Rehoboth Ave, Rehoboth Beach, DE 19971, USA
name: Coastal Bliss Wellness

reviews.text:
Omg , I can’t  say enough about Coastal Bliss Wellness! Vesna gives hands-down the BEST massage I have ever had in my life! She goes above and beyond and you can really tell that she is highly educated, trained, and really knows what she’s doing. The effects from one massage with her stay with me for weeks.
Milena is very knowledgeable about the skin care and the skin in general. She takes time to assess the condition and choose the most suitable treatment that you need at the moment. I suffer from dry skin and her treatments have been helping me enormously .So happy I found them.
Bonus, they are so kind and lovely and I can’t recommend them enough. ❤️

My facial with Milena was amazing! She took such a good care of my skin, gave me an amazing massage that comes with a facial, my skin looks so much brigther now, it’s glowing. Can’t wait to come back and have my mani & pedi with her, great selection of colors. They welcomed me with cold beverages, and the most important they provide a free PARKING for you in summer! Highly recommend

The spa is super clean and well organized! The staff is very welcoming!  I have done my nails with Milena many times, and she does a great job. She is also a fantastic aesthetician. Vesna is the best massage therapist I have had so far. I am highly recommending both of them. Go and check their new place! 💯

My best friend and I went to Coastal Bliss for a surprise couples massage to celebrate his birthday, and it was absolutely amazing! From the moment we walked in, the space felt calm, clean, and full of good vibes. Our massage therapists, Vesna and Ceasar, were incredible — kind, empathetic, funny, and so in tune with what we needed.

Vesna, who’s also the owner, represents her business so beautifully. She was open-minded, patient, and professional, with such strong, healing hands that made me feel brand new. You can really feel the care and passion she puts into every detail. We left feeling relaxed, recharged, and so grateful for the experience.

If you’re looking for a personalized, high-quality massage with heart — this is the place to go. Can’t wait to come back! 💆‍♀️💆‍♂️✨

I had the Sun-Kissed Facial along with a spa manicure and pedicure at this brand new spa, and I couldn’t be happier! The staff were incredibly attentive and welcoming, and the space itself is absolutely stunning—honestly, the most beautiful spa I’ve seen in the area. The treatments were top-notch and left me feeling completely refreshed and pampered. I’m already looking forward to my next visit next month!
